#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
int calgcd(int x,int y)
{
	int r;
	do
	{	
		r=x%y;	
		x=y;
		y=r;
	}while(r!=0);
	return x;
}

int main()
{
	int T,i;
	cin>>T;
	while(T--)
	{
		ll lcm;
		int a,b,gc;
		cin>>a>>b;
		lcm=(a*b);
		gc=calgcd(a,b);
		lcm=lcm/gc;
		cout<<gc<<" "<<lcm<<endl;
	}
}
